de.lessvoid.nifty

Class NiftyLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.nifty.NiftyLayout

  • public class NiftyLayout
extends Object
    This is the class that supports the layout nodes to do their work. It is the primary entry point to trigger the layout process.
    Author:
    Martin Karing <nitram@illarion.org>

    • Method Detail

      • getNifty

        @Nonnull
public Nifty getNifty()

      • reportRemoval

        public void reportRemoval(@Nonnull
                          NiftyLayoutNodeImpl<? extends NiftyNode> node)
        Report the removal of a specific node. This causes the parent node to require a recalculation.
        Parameters:
        node - the node that was removed

      • reportMeasureInvalid

        public void reportMeasureInvalid(@Nonnull
                                 NiftyLayoutNodeImpl<? extends NiftyNode> node)
        Report the measure of the specific node as invalid. The layout master will mark the measure value of every parent layout node as invalid during the next update of the layout.
        Parameters:
        node - the node that got a invalid measure

      • reportArrangeInvalid

        public void reportArrangeInvalid(@Nonnull
                                 NiftyLayoutNodeImpl<? extends NiftyNode> node)
        Report the arrangement of the specific node as invalid. The arranging will be triggered for the highest leveled nodes that are marked invalid in the tree to make the rearrange their sub-tree.
        Parameters:
        node - the node that got a invalid child arrangement

      • reportChangedArrangement

        public void reportChangedArrangement(@Nonnull
                                     NiftyLayoutNodeImpl<? extends NiftyNode> node)
        Report that the arrangement of the node was changed and needs to be published to the receivers.
        Parameters:
        node - the node with the new arrangement

      • measure

        @Nonnull
public NiftySize measure(@Nonnull
                                  NiftyNodeImpl<? extends NiftyNode> node,
                                  @Nonnull
                                  NiftySize availableSize)
        Measure the node that is set as parameter or the first layout need in the tree below.
        Parameters:
        node - the node that is the root for this operation
        availableSize - the available size that is forwarded to NiftyLayoutNodeImpl.measure(NiftySize)
        Returns:
        size returned by the NiftyLayoutNodeImpl.measure(NiftySize) function that is called for the node(s)
